short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Colors SPOJ Problems based on difficulty.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Visit any user profile and see all SPOJ Problems colored with a different shade of red(0-255) , So brighter red (ie higher value of r in rgb) indicates tougher problem and darker indicates easier.
